description:
Bosatsu goes to work with Fukuma, Satetsu gets used as a test subject, and Ronaldo gets stuck in a mysterious space.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`Obscur Fukuma à la poursuite d`un rêve / Le niais incontrôlable / Terminus : Arrière Shin-Yokohama
Michi Naru Fukuma ni Yume o Motomete / Bousou Tokkyuu Ohitoyoshi / Tsugi wa Shuuten Ura Shin-Yokohama
The Dream-Quest of Unknown Fukuma / A Kind Man Under Siege / Last Stop, Ura-Shin-Yokohama
未知なるフクマに夢を求めて / 暴走特急お人好し / 次は終点裏新横浜
